  • Method Details

    • orderPaid

      public void orderPaid(List<Order> order, List<Order> paidOrder, int tableNumber)
      Function used when an order is paid. Find the order according to the table number. Changes the status of the table.
      Parameters:
      order - This is the list of orders.
      paidOrder - This is the list of paid orders.
      tableNumber - This is the table number of the order being paid.

    • viewOrder

      public void viewOrder(Order order, boolean discounted)
      Viewing of order invoice before paying.
      Parameters:
      order - this is the order to view.
      discounted - this indicate if there is a discount.

    • createOrder

      public Order createOrder(List<MenuItem> MenuItem, List<Promotion> Promotion, Staff waiter, Table table, Customer customer)
      Creates a new order object.
      Parameters:
      MenuItem - This is a list of a le carte items avaliable in the restaurant.
      Promotion - This is a list of promotion set items avaliable in the restaurant.
      waiter - This is the waiter making the order.
      table - This is the table where the customer is sitting.
      customer - This is the customer making the order.
      Returns:
      the created order.

    • removeOrderItem

      public void removeOrderItem(List<Order> order, int tableNumber)
      Function to remove an ordered item in the order. Item can be a le carte or promotion set.
      Parameters:
      order - This is the list of orders.
      tableNumber - This is the table number of the order being paid.

    • addOrderItem

      public void addOrderItem(List<Order> order, List<MenuItem> MenuItem, List<Promotion> Promotion, int tableNumber)
      Function to add an item in the order. Item can be a le carte or promotion set.
      Parameters:
      order - This is the list of orders.
      MenuItem - This is a list of a le carte items avaliable in the restaurant.
      Promotion - This is a list of promotion set items avaliable in the restaurant.
      tableNumber - This is the table number of the order being paid.
